column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our drinks took way too long to get even had to ask him to check on them it was not even busy. I took a bite and couldn't believe that this would happen not at this so called takes forever to get a reservation and so well sought after to dine in.. literally could not believe I had better cooked steaks at Texas Roadhouse... seriously.. for me to compare the two and come to that conclusion baffles me. I asked my husband how is yours said same as yours. The taste it left in your mouth. I couldn't even...so bitter.
